author: swagata87
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40017, to address https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39987.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 12434.0` ran fine.
title: [12_4_X] [TsosGaussianStateConversions] proposal fix for Gsf Tracking segmentation fault when no states are passing selection criteria
